Personality Test

  1. I enjoy vibrant social events with lots of people
  2. I often spend time exploring unrealistic yet intriguing ideas
  3. My travel plans are more likely to look like a rough list of ideas than a detailed itinerary.
  4. If my friend is sad about something, My first instinct is to support them emotionally, not try to solve their problem.
  5. I often rely on other people to be the ones to start a conversation and keep it going.
  6. I am more of a detail-oriented than a big picture person.
  7. If I have to temporarily put my plans on hold, I make sure it is my top priority to get back on track as soon as possible.
  8. I often find it difficult to relate to people who let their emotions guide them.
  9. I rarely worry if I have made a good impression on someone I met.
  10. I am still bothered by the mistakes i made a long time ago.
  11. I have a careful and methodical approach to life.
  12. I can stay calm under a lot of pressure.
  13. It would be a challenge for Me to spend the whole weekend all by Myself without feeling bored.
  14. I cannot imagine myself dedicating my life to the study of something that I cannot see, touch, or experience.
  15. I am dedicated and focused on my goals, only rarely getting sidetracked.
  16. If I make a mistake, I tend to start doubting myself, my abilities, or my knowledge.
  17. When in a group of people I am not acquainted with, I have no problem jumping right into their conversation.
  18. I tend to focus on present realities rather than future possibilities.
  19. I often make decisions on a whim.
  20. I often have a hard time understanding other people’s feelings.
  21. When at a social event, I rarely try to introduce myself to new people and mostly talk to the ones I already know.
  22. It is important to me to follow traditions
  23. I always know exactly what I want.
  24. I look after myself first, and others come in second.
  25. I feel more drawn to places with a bustling and busy atmosphere than to more quiet and intimate ones.
  26. I like to do things as they were done in the past
  27. When starting to work on a project, I prefer to make as many decisions upfront as possible
  28. I rarely dwell on my regrets.
  29. The time I spend by myself often ends up being more interesting and satisfying than the time I spend with other people.
  30. I like discussing different views and theories on what the world could look like in the future.
  31. Even when I have planned a particular daily routine, I usually just end up doing what I feel like at any given moment.
  32. I always consider how my actions might affect other people before doing something.
  33. When in a public place, I usually stick to quieter and less crowded areas.
  34. I often drift away into daydreaming about various ideas or scenarios.
  35. I loose my belongins.
  36. I feel uncomfortable when I disagree with someone.
  37. Spending time in a dynamic atmosphere with lots of people around quickly makes Me feel drained and in need of a getaway.
  38. I often contemplate the reasons for human existence or the meaning of life
  39. I would rather go with the flow than have a set schedule.
  40. I work hard to please others.
  41. I try not to draw attention to myself.
  42. My personal work style is closer to spontaneous bursts of energy than to organized and consistent efforts.Intuitive
  43. I would rather go with the flow than have a set schedule.
  44. Emotional people make me uncomfortable thinker.
  45. I have little to say.
  46. My travel plans are more likely to look like a rough list of ideas than a detailed itinerary.
  47. Emotional people make me uncomfortable.
  48. I put my needs first.
  49. I keep my belongings in their proper place.
  50. I would rather go with the flow than have a set schedule.
